name: Damn virgins
description: Seven virgins will be sacrified unless you help them! Just to clarify, your help is only needed to avoid the sacrifice, solving their virginity problem is a bit more complicated as you will discover. FMV adventure inspired in classic adventure games. Solving puzzles usually unlocks a videoclip that reveals the plot.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only), Windows Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM3-compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I'm enjoying it so far, I love the weird humor and all the references to classic adventure games. It would be nice to have more achivements, and it's possible to reload previous saves instead on just continue the game?
